name: Alpha USD0
description: USD0a is a USD-denominated, yield-bearing asset that provides exposure to Superstate's USCC fund. USCC runs a market-neutral cash-and-carry strategy across BTC, ETH, and SOL, with a small portion held in U.S. Treasury bills and cash for liquidity. It is designed as a permissionless, institutional-grade asset combining stable yield accrual with DAO-managed collateral routing and transparent redemption mechanics.
